product_name: Gore Bike Wear Countdown Bike Gloves - Men's
long_description: Waterproof, lightweight and lightly padded, the GORE BIKE WEAR Countdown mountain bike gloves provide protection from the weather while you conquer tough terrain and challenging trails.
short_description: Waterproof, lightweight and lightly padded, the GORE BIKE WEAR Countdown mountain bike gloves provide protection from the weather while you conquer tough terrain and challenging trails.
